00012 #ifndef LEGENDRE_H_
00013 #define LEGENDRE_H_
00014 
00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * Legendre polynomial class templates definitions and implementations. The      *
00017  * classes define functions to evaluate the polynomial and its derivative at any *
00018  * point, and to compute the roots and the Gauss-quadrature weights, and a       *
00019  * member template integrating any given function.                               *
00020  *                                                                               *
00021  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00022 
00023 #include <cstdlib>
00024 #include <cmath>
00025 
00026 namespace Camorra
00027 {
00029 
00030     template<class value_t,std::size_t N>class Legendre
00031     {
00032         public:
00033 
00035 
00036             typedef value_t value_type;
00037 
00039 
00040             static const std::size_t rank=N;
00041 
00043 
00044             static const bool symmetric=(N%2==0);
00045 
00048 
00049             static void initialise(std::size_t NR_iterations=10)
00050             {
00051                 if(!initialised)
00052                 {
00053                     value_type pi=std::acos(-(value_type)1);
00054                     for(std::size_t n=0;n<N;++n)
00055                     {
00056                         roots[n]=std::cos(value_type(4*n+3)*pi/value_type(4*N+2));
00057                         for(std::size_t i=0;i<NR_iterations;++i)
00058                         {
00059                             roots[n]-=value(roots[n])/derivative(roots[n]);
00060                         }
00061                         value_type p=derivative(roots[n]);
00062                         weights[n]=(value_type)2/(((value_type)1-roots[n]*roots[n])*p*p);
00063                     }
00064                     initialised=true;
00065                 }
00066             }
00067 
00069 
00070             static value_type value(const value_type& x)
00071             {
00072                 return ((2*N-1)*x*Legendre<value_t,N-1>::value(x)-(N-1)*Legendre<value_t,N-2>::value(x))/(value_type)N;
00073             }
00074 
00076 
00077             static value_type derivative(const value_type& x)
00078             {
00079                 return ((2*N-1)*(x*Legendre<value_t,N-1>::derivative(x)+Legendre<value_t,N-1>::value(x))-(N-1)*Legendre<value_t,N-2>::derivative(x))/(value_type)N;                     
00080             }
00081 
00083 
00084             static value_type root(std::size_t n)
00085             {
00086                 initialise();
00087                 return (n<N)?roots[n]:(value_type)0;
00088             }
00089 
00091 
00092             static value_type weight(std::size_t n)
00093             {
00094                 initialise();
00095                 return (n<N)?weights[n]:(value_type)0;
00096             }
00097 
00100 
00101             template<value_type f(const value_type&)>static value_type Gauss_integrate(const value_type& a,const value_type& b)
00102             {
00103                 initialise();
00104                 value_type s=(value_type)0.5*(a+b);
00105                 value_type d=(value_type)0.5*(b-a);
00106                 value_type x;
00107                 value_type result=0;
00108                 for(unsigned i=0;i<N;++i)
00109                 {
00110                     x=roots[i]*d+s;
00111                     result+=weights[i]*f(x);
00112                 }
00113                 
00114                 return d*result;
00115             }
00116 
00117         private:
00118 
00119             /* Initialisation flag: */
00120 
00121             static bool initialised;
00122 
00123             /* Roots of the Legendre polynomial: */
00124 
00125             static value_type roots[N];
00126             
00127             /* Weights of Gauss quadrature: */
00128             
00129             static value_type weights[N];
00130     };
00131     template<class value_t,std::size_t N>bool Legendre<value_t,N>::initialised=false;
00132     template<class value_t,std::size_t N>typename Legendre<value_t,N>::value_type Legendre<value_t,N>::roots[]={0};
00133     template<class value_t,std::size_t N>typename Legendre<value_t,N>::value_type Legendre<value_t,N>::weights[]={0};
00134 
00135     /* Zeroth-order Legendre polynomial specialisation: */
00136 
00137     template<class value_t>class Legendre<value_t,0>
00138     {
00139         public:
00140 
00141             /* Value type definition. */
00142 
00143             typedef value_t value_type;
00144             
00145             /* Polynomial rank definition. */
00146             
00147             static const std::size_t rank=0;
00148 
00149             /* Symmetry tag definition. */
00150 
00151             static const bool symmetric=true;
00152 
00153             /* Initialisation method. */
00154 
00155             static void initialise(){}  
00156             
00157             /* Legendre polynomial evaluation in point x. */
00158             
00159             static value_type value(const value_type& x)
00160             {
00161                 return (value_type)1;
00162             }
00163 
00164             /* Evaluation of the derivative in point x. */
00165 
00166             static value_type derivative(const value_type& x)
00167             {
00168                 return (value_type)0;
00169 
00170             }
00171 
00172             /* Returns the n-th root. */
00173 
00174             static value_type root(std::size_t n)
00175             {
00176                 return (value_type)0;
00177             }
00178 
00179             /* Returns the n-th Gauss quadrature weight. */
00180 
00181             static value_type weight(std::size_t n)
00182             {
00183                 return (value_type)0;
00184             }
00185 
00186             /* Integrates the template argument function on the interval [a,b]
00187              * by Gauss quadrature. */
00188 
00189             template<value_type f(const value_type&)>static value_type Gauss_integrate(const value_type& a,const value_type& b)
00190             {
00191                 return (value_type)0;
00192             }
00193     };

00195     /* First-order Legendre polynomial specialisation: */
00196 
00197     template<class value_t>class Legendre<value_t,1>
00198     {
00199         public:
00200 
00201             /* Value type definition. */
00202 
00203             typedef value_t value_type;
00204             
00205             /* Polynomial rank definition. */
00206             
00207             static const std::size_t rank=1;
00208 
00209             /* Symmetry tag definition. */
00210 
00211             static const bool symmetric=false;
00212 
00213             /* Initialisation method. */
00214 
00215             static void initialise(){}  
00216             
00217             /* Legendre polynomial evaluation in point x. */
00218             
00219             static value_type value(const value_type& x)
00220             {
00221                 return x;
00222             }
00223 
00224             /* Evaluation of the derivative in point x. */
00225 
00226             static value_type derivative(const value_type& x)
00227             {
00228                 return (value_type)1;
00229 
00230             }
00231 
00232             /* Returns the n-th root. */
00233 
00234             static value_type root(std::size_t n)
00235             {
00236                 return (value_type)0;
00237             }
00238 
00239             /* Returns the n-th Gauss quadrature weight. */
00240 
00241             static value_type weight(std::size_t n)
00242             {
00243                 return (n==0)?(value_type)1:(value_type)0;
00244             }
00245 
00246             /* Integrates the template argument function on the interval [a,b]
00247              * by Gauss quadrature. */
00248 
00249             template<value_type f(const value_type&)>static value_type Gauss_integrate(const value_type& a,const value_type& b)
00250             {
00251                 return f((value_type)0);
00252             }
00253     };
